meanings.definition: Having a stronger or more pronounced yeast flavor.
meanings.sent1: The bread tasted yeastier than usual.
meanings.sent2: This pizza is yeastier than the one we had yesterday.
meanings.sent3: I never thought I would enjoy something so yeastier!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a yeastier version of music to my ears.
meanings.sent5: The air in the bakery was filled with the yeastier aroma of freshly baked bread.

meanings.sent1: The new bread recipe is yeastier than the old one.
meanings.sent2: Today's batch of dough seems yeastier than yesterday's.
meanings.sent3: I can't believe how much yeastier this bread is compared to the last one!
meanings.sent4: The atmosphere in the kitchen was getting yeastier by the minute.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the rising dough grew yeastier as the hours passed.
